name: CurveCity
description:
CurveCity is a little city-builder and relaxing game made in 84 hours about building a futuristic city with curves.

You can create houses, farm and factory and upgrades them by placing more connecting curves to them.

Try to get the best score at building your city or just relax ! Have fun !

Tip : you can add curves from Tier 3 & 4 builds.

Code  - Shynif
Art    - Made from Trix's art
Music - Yann "Belze" Roland

Left Click - Place a curve
Right Click - Remove the curve
S - Show your score
R - Restart
F / F7 - Full screen
F12 - Take a screenshot

(in windows screenshots are located at <drive>:/Users/YOURUSERNAME/AppData/Local/[Game Name]/ and on Mac it would be ~/Library/Application Support/[Game Name]/)

Have fun with the source code if you want to tweak some stuff !




NOTE : Donations go to Yann Roland (music) and Trix  (art)
